# AnchoringComponent.Target.image(group:name:)

**Case**

An anchor point attached to the image specified by a group and a name in AR Resources.

## Declaration

```swift
case image(group: String, name: String)
```

## Discussion



## Image and object anchor targets

- **AnchoringComponent.Target.referenceImage(from:)**: An anchor point attached to the image specified by an image anchoring source.
- **AnchoringComponent.Target.object(group:name:)**: An anchor point attached to the object specified by a group and a name in AR Resources.
- **AnchoringComponent.Target.referenceObject(from:)**: An anchor point attached to an object that matches the reference of an object anchor.

items.description: An anchor point attached to the image specified by an image anchoring source.
items.name: AnchoringComponent.Target.referenceImage(from:)

items.description: An anchor point attached to the object specified by a group and a name in AR Resources.
items.name: AnchoringComponent.Target.object(group:name:)

items.description: An anchor point attached to an object that matches the reference of an object anchor.
items.name: AnchoringComponent.Target.referenceObject(from:)
